function EP_BAD_01()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

SAVE()

  -- //EP1：選択肢㈰で【1】【2】を選んだ場合に、バッドエンド後に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

-- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
WAIT_INPUT(500)
-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Three!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Two!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano03.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "One!" ]])

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028aa")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano04.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Boom!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano05.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Wheeeee!" ]])

-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)

-- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ（通常）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  --LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)

  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,-300)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.Liner)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,30,500,Ease.OutSine)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,200,Ease.InSine)

  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,-300)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.Liner)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,30,500,Ease.OutSine)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,200,Ease.InSine)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano06.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato・????】
 "Why, Bokuhime!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano07.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】笑顔
 "Everyone, gather around!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano08.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】笑顔
 "Even if you reach a bad end, don’t worry! It’s time for 'Why, Bokuhime?' where we explain why you got that ending!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano09.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】※Akira normal
 "Gather 'round..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
  LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,20,20,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano10.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "Y-you’re not very enthusiastic, are you!? I was told by Akira to come to this weird place!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano11.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】悲しみ
 "Well, I never thought I’d have my appearance exposed in this bonus corner before the main story. I’m just horrified at this unfair treatment of the main heroine." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ka")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano12.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】ニヤリ
 "Ah, first appearance... thanks. I’m Akira Ikusa, the main heroine of this game." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano13.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】ニヤリ
 "Is there any other heroine who appears in the bonus corner before the main story like me? Of course not... haha." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano14.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "D-don’t sulk... It’s an important first time, so let’s do our best, okay?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano15.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】通常
 "Yeah, yeah. That’s the tough part about being a game character." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano16.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】笑顔
 "Now then, as Minatchin said earlier, this corner explains why you reached the ending you did after clearing the ending." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04eb")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano17.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】笑顔
 "Because of its nature, this corner contains spoilers, meta comments, and obvious parodies, so you can skip it even if you haven’t read it yet. If you don’t like it, please feel free to skip." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano18.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "O-obvious parodies aren’t really necessary, are they? And is it okay for us, the characters, to recommend skipping...?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano19.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】通常
 "It’s fine. Some people don’t like this kind of joke. It’s best treated lightly, like watching it when you’re stuck on a route." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ka")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano20.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】ニヤリ
 "By the way, the reason you reached a bad end this time is quite simple. The correct choice was hidden." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano21.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】ニヤリ
 "It’s a so-called forced bad end. No matter how much Minatchin struggled, it was despair all the way." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano22.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "T-that’s cruel..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano23.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】笑顔
 "Well, some choices only appear after certain flags are triggered." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano24.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】通常
 "If you’ve stuck with our nonsense this far, you should have already triggered some flags, so please try again." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano25.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】通常
 "Minatchin is way more of a musclehead than everyone thinks. He can surprisingly take reckless moves, so maybe he should try throwing himself into danger." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano26.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "Don’t say reckless things like it’s someone else’s problem..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano27.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】笑顔
 "It actually is someone else’s problem. And being treated like a pervert is just the beginning. The real trouble for Minatchin is still to come." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,true)

  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,20,100,Ease.OutSine)
  WAIT(100)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,100,Ease.InSine)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano28.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "Still to come? What worse things could happen!?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ka")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano29.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】ニヤリ
 "Oops... I said too much about the future. Well then, I’ll be waiting somewhere a little further ahead." ]])


  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
  WAIT(300)

  STOP_BGM(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG000aa")
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,1000,Ease.Liner)
  LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
  WAIT(1000)

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano30.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Please watch again!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano31.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Tell me what’s going to happen!" ]])

  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

-- //選択肢㈰の直前から再開。

  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_01 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
